content: blo single_crochet in next 2 sts finish off and join with invisible join 140 sts 4 ch2 spaces note if you square does not currently measure about 11 1/2 inches you may want to add this additional row prior to the edging join in both loops in any single_crochet after ch2 space ch1 working in both loops single_crochet in same as joining *single_crochet in each st across to ch2 work a single_crochet in the first chain ch2 single_crochet in next chain repeat from * round single_crochet in any remaining stitches edging with ca join in both loops in any single_crochet after ch2 space ch1 single_crochet in same as joining and in next 34 sts work 2sc in each of the chs * single_crochet in next 35 sts work 2sc in each of the chs repeat from * around finish off and join with invisible join 156 single_crochet copyright katidcreations 2016 do not copy or repost any portion of this pattern if you would like to share the pattern please share a link to the original design copyright katidcreations 2016 page 7 copyright katidcreations 2016 page 8
